price: ហើយនៅពេលដែលយើងបានបំបាត់ទណ្ឌកម្មចេញពីពួកគេ ពេលនោះពួកគេបែរជាក្បត់(ពាក្យសន្យា)ទៅវិញ។
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
